text.text: How do I access the profit centers management section?

text: To access the profit centers management section, you can hover over Manage on the Navigation Bar and select Settings. On the Settings page, click the Profit centers tab.

text.text: What is the purpose of profit centers in ZOLL Billing, and how can they benefit my operations?

text: Profit centers can be geographical regions or names for defining groupings or buckets. You can use profit centers to find specific claims based on tags, exact claim balance, or claim in a certain profit center.

text.text: Can you explain how to enable profit centers?

text: Once enabled, a profit center must exist for every claim. Claims being worked prior to enabling this feature will not require a profit center.

text.text: What are the two types of profit centers available in ZOLL Billing, and how do they differ?

text: If you define profit centers by name or geographical zone, and then change from one to the other, all configuration changes will be lost. For geographical zones, that means that all the zones you drew on the map will be gone.

text.text: How can I define profit centers by name in ZOLL Billing, and what steps are involved?

text: To define profit centers by name, you need to: 1. In the 'Name' field on the Profit Center page, enter the name representing this profit center. 2. Click Add. 3. Keep entering names and clicking Add until you have all the profit centers identified. 4. When you are done, click Save.

text.text: Is there a limit to the number of profit centers I can create by name?

text: There is no limit to the number of profit centers you can create by name.

text.text: Can you guide me through the process of modifying a profit center name?

text: To modify a profit center name, you need to: 1. Hover over Manage on the Navigation Bar and select Settings. 2. On the Settings page, click the Profit centers tab. 3. Find the name of the center you wish to change and click in that field. 4. Make the name change and then click Save.

text.text: What steps should I follow to delete a profit center name?

text: To delete a profit center name, you need to: 1. Hover over Manage on the Navigation Bar and select Settings. 2. On the Settings page, click the Profit centers tab. 3. Find the name of the center you wish to delete and on that same line, click the trash can.

text.text: How do I create profit center zones using geographical mapping?

text: To create a profit center zone, you need to: 1. Click and then click the place on the map to start drawing the zone. You will see a round dot with a line. 2. Continue clicking locations on the map until the line meets the beginning dot - the zone can be any shape. Click to stop drawing. 3. Under the 'Profit center geographical zones' heading you will see a line that reads 'Not named'. Click the edit icon on that line. 4. In the window that pops-up, enter a name for the zone and select a color. Click Apply.

text.text: Can you explain the different tools available for manipulating profit center zones on the map?

text: The map has a number of tools for manipulating profit center zones. The + and - buttons on the lower right corner zoom in and out of the map. The Map button at the top right corner shows the street map view. Click Map > Terrain to show street map view with topography and elevation.

text.text: What options are available for viewing geographical zones in the profit center map?

text: To run the report, you need to: 1. On the navigation bar, hover over Analytics and click Reports. 2. Scroll down the list and click All payment details. 3. Accounting Period Start Date: Click this field and select the accounting period date. 4. Profit Centers: Click this field to select one or more profit centers to include in the report. 5. Display Inactive Zones: If you want to include inactive profit center zones, select True. 6. Display HCPCS: If you want to include HCPCS, select True. 7. Click View Report.

text.text: How do I name and assign colors to profit center zones on the map?

text: To name and assign colors to profit center zones on the map, you need to: 1. Under the 'Profit center geographical zones' heading you will see a line that reads 'Not named'. Click the edit icon on that line. 2. In the window that pops-up, enter a name for the zone and select a color. Click Apply.

text.text: Can you walk me through the process of modifying the boundaries of a profit center zone?

text: To modify the boundaries of a profit center zone, you need to: 1. On the Profit Center page, click 2. Grab a pin on the boundary and drag it to the desired map location. As you drag a pin, a dot displays in the middle between two pins.

text.text: Can you walk me through the process of modifying the boundaries of a profit center zone??

text: To modify the boundaries of a profit center zone, you need to: 1. On the Profit Center page, click. 2. Grab a pin on the boundary and drag it to the desired map location. As you drag a pin, a dot displays in the middle between two pins.

text.text: What factors determine the auto-population of profit center names?

text: If the address was not geocoded, the system cannot determine if it is in a profit center. If the boundaries of one profit center overlaps with another, and the pick-up address lands in the overlapped area, you will need to manually pick the profit center from the list.

text.text: What should I do if the pick-up address does not fall within a defined profit center?

text: If the pick-up location was not geocoded, you can click the "Profit center" field and select one from the list. If the boundaries of one profit center overlaps with another, and the pick-up address lands in the overlapped area, you will need to manually pick the profit center from the list.

text.text: How can I find claims associated with specific profit centers in ZOLL Billing?

text: To find claims associated with specific profit centers in ZOLL Billing, you can use the "Profit center" field in the Advanced Search page. You can select one or more profit centers from the list and then click Search.

text.text: What options do I have for searching and filtering claims by profit center?

text: You can also use the "Profit center" field in the Advanced Search page. You can select one or more profit centers from the list and then click Search. You can also use the "Profit center" field in the All payment details report. You can select one or more profit centers to include in the report.

text.text: Is there a way to customize the columns displayed in the search results to include profit center information?

text: If you do not see the "Profit center" column, you can click "Customize columns" and move it from the left column to the right column. You can then click "Save".

text.text: Where can I find additional resources or support if I encounter difficulties managing profit centers in ZOLL Billing?

text: You can find additional resources and support on the ZOLL Billing website.

text.text: how to administer profit centers?

text: To administer profit centers, you must first enable profit centers and define the profit center type. You can then create profit centers by name or by geographical zone. To create profit centers by name, you can enter the name representing the profit center in the "Name" field and click Add. To create profit centers by geographical zone, you can select the "Geographical Zone of Transport Origin" type and click Save.
For more information click this: https://help.zollonline.com/billing/Content/Videos.htm?wchannelid=m8t21u1viq&wmediaid=kf8z7buwn0

text.text: how to enable profit center?

text: To enable profit centers, you must first go to the Settings page and click the Profit centers tab. Then, you must check the "Enable profit centers" box and select a profit center type. Finally, you must click Save.

text.text: how to modify and delete a profit center?

text: To modify a profit center name, you can hover over Manage on the Navigation Bar and select Settings. On the Settings page, click the Profit centers tab. Find the name of the center you wish to change and click in that field. Make the name change and then click Save. To delete a profit center name, you can hover over Manage on the Navigation Bar and select Settings. On the Settings page, click the Profit centers tab. Find the name of the center you wish to delete and on that same line, click the trash can.

text.text: how to use the profit center map?

text: The profit center map has a plus and minus sign located on the lower right corner to zoom in and out. The map also has a terrain option to show topography and elevation.

text.text: i want to create a profit center zone

text: To create a profit center zone, you can click and then click the place on the map to start drawing the zone. You will see a round dot with a line. You can also use the located in the top middle to stop drawing, drag the map around the screen, and modify the lines on a zone.

text.text: how do i modify zone boundries?

text: To modify zone boundaries, you can click the Profit Center page, then click Modifying the zone boundaries. You can also use the located in the top middle to stop drawing, drag the map around the screen, and modify the lines on a zone.

text.text: how can i apply profit center to  a claim?

text: After profit centers is enabled, users will be required to enter a profit center on all incomplete claims. This is a forward moving feature meaning you will not be required to enter a profit center for existing claims, only for new, incomplete claims. The 'Profit center' field displays on the Charges tab.

text.text: based on what will ht eprofit center name be auto populated?

text: The profit center name will be auto populated based on the pick-up location. If the address was not geocoded, the system cannot determine if it is in a profit center. If the boundaries of one profit center overlaps with another, and the pick-up address lands in the overlapped area, you will need to manually pick the profit center from the list.

text.text: what are the two options i can use to find claim by profit center?

text: You can use the following options to find a claim by profit center: 1. On the Advanced Search page, click in the 'Profit center' field and select a center from the list. 2. On the Search Results page, the profit center column lists the center for the claim you searched for.
